name: Baller!
description:
Baller (by Tribit) is a simple, yet fun and addicting game!

Try to reach the top of the screen as many times as possible without being hit by a line.

Once you reach the top, you get back to the bottom in an endless game!

Lines get faster as you score points, so don't get too confident!

Beat your own high score, then challenge your friends and see who can get the highest score of all!

It's also available on iOS and Android!
